name: K.O. - Kyle O'Connell
description:
This game is about you trying to defeat an AI car by Spawning obstacles and making it collide with the obstacles. We have also included a game that you play with your friend where either one creates obstacles and the other controls the car. You activate this mode by clicking the steering wheel on the start screen.

Instructions-->

Single Mode:-

> Click to spawn obstacles at any four of the lanes

> Use z,x,c to switch between obstacles

Local Multiplayer Mode:-

> Click to spawn obstacles at any four lanes

> Use z,x,c to switch between obstacles

> Use left, right arrows to control the car

>  Press ESC to pause the game

On the end screen click Kyle O'Connell autograph to restart the game.
